alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:55AM CDT until June 29 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coles County in east central Illinois... Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Clark County in east central Illinois... Southwestern Vermilion County in east central Illinois... South central Champaign County in east central Illinois... Douglas County in east central Illinois... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 655 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Camargo, or near Tuscola, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hindsboro around 710 AM CDT. Newman around 715 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Oakland, Brocton, Kansas, Redmon, Paris, Vermilion, Oliver and Dennison. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 207 and 218. Interstate 70 near mile marker 154. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion
